applyForm.description: If you’re ready to bring your creativity, skills, and good vibes to Dreamart 3D, we want to hear from you! Fill out the form below and show us what makes you extraordinary. Let’s create, collaborate, and have some fun along the way. The adventure starts now!
applyForm.title: Ready to Join the Fun?

hero.description: Welcome to Dreamart 3D — the place where ideas turn into tangible reality, imagination is our superpower, and creativity is our secret weapon. We don’t just create 3D models, animations, and designs — we craft experiences that make your brand unforgettable.

requirements.0: Solid experience with 3D modelling software (Blender, Autodesk, etc.).
requirements.1: A passion for details — because precision is your middle name.
requirements.2: Ability to take a concept and turn it into a tangible masterpiece.
requirements.3: Good vibes only — bring your creativity and your fun side!

responsibilities.0: Transform ideas into tangible 3D creations (from product prototypes to custom miniatures).
responsibilities.1: Work with the team to create print-ready designs for a variety of industries (no pressure, just cool stuff).
responsibilities.2: Push the boundaries of creativity while making sure each model is precision-perfect.
responsibilities.3: Play around with cutting-edge 3D software and stay on top of the latest trends in the industry.

requirements.0: A strong background in 2D/3D animation and motion graphics.
requirements.1: Experience with animation software (Maya, After Effects, etc.).
requirements.2: A passionate storyteller who can turn an idea into an engaging experience.
requirements.3: Detail-oriented with a pinch of creativity and a dash of humor!

responsibilities.0: Create eye-popping animations that make people say “Wow!”
responsibilities.1: Work closely with the design team to bring characters, stories, and products to life through animation.
responsibilities.2: Develop motion graphics and cinematic animations for various projects (no boring stuff allowed!).
responsibilities.3: Make sure the animation is not just moving, but moving with purpose.

requirements.0: A portfolio that showcases your user-centered designs.
requirements.1: Proficiency in UI/UX tools (Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD, etc.).
requirements.2: An eye for clean, sleek, and modern designs.
requirements.3: A problem-solver who thrives on creating seamless user experiences.

responsibilities.0: Design smooth, seamless user interfaces that users can’t stop clicking (literally).
responsibilities.1: Collaborate with developers to ensure designs are beautiful AND functional.
responsibilities.2: Use your design superpowers to craft user-centric designs that improve every digital experience.
responsibilities.3: Keep up with the latest design trends and innovative techniques to stay ahead of the game.

requirements.0: Proven experience with video production (camera work, editing, lighting, sound, etc.).
requirements.1: Experience in motion graphics and video editing software (Premiere Pro, After Effects, Final Cut Pro).
requirements.2: A storyteller who loves making videos that stick in people’s minds.
requirements.3: Must love collaborating and having fun along the way!

responsibilities.0: Direct, shoot, and edit high-impact videos that will blow your audience away.
responsibilities.1: Collaborate with the team to create everything from product demos to cinematic brand stories.
responsibilities.2: Ensure each video is emotionally captivating, not just “nice to watch.”
responsibilities.3: Work your magic with special effects, animations, and some jaw-dropping edits.

0.text: We believe in letting your creativity flow without limits.
0.title: Creative freedom

1.text: Work with a team that supports and challenges you.
1.title: Collaborative environment

2.text: The more you learn, the more you grow — both personally and professionally.
2.title: Growth opportunities

3.text: We work hard, but we also know how to keep it light — no matter where you are! Virtual game nights, online challenges, and plenty of laughs.
3.title: Great Vibes

dealsHero.description: Why pay full price when you can get the best 3D models at a discounted rate? Our limited-time offers are too good to miss! Whether you’re looking for stunning decor, custom keychains, or unique jewelry pieces, we’ve got you covered with amazing deals on high-quality, print-ready models. But hurry — these deals won’t last forever! Get them while you can, and make your ideas come to life with incredible savings.
dealsHero.title: Hot Deals, Cool Models!

editUserForm.savingError: Something went wrong — please refresh and try again, or email us directly at info@trendelladigital.com.

getInTouch.description: Got a question, a project idea, or need a custom quote? Don’t be shy — we’re all ears! At Dreamart 3D, we believe every great project begins with a conversation. Reach out to us and let’s turn your wildest ideas into digital masterpieces!
getInTouch.description2: Got a project waiting to be brought to life? Or maybe you’re just craving to start something new and exciting? We’ve got you covered! Let’s team up and turn your ideas into digital masterpieces that’ll leave a lasting impression.
getInTouch.socialsDescription: We’re always creating, and we want you to be part of it! Follow us on social media for the latest on our projects, industry trends, and some serious creative inspo. Get involved, stay updated, and let’s start something amazing!
getInTouch.title: Get in Touch: Let’s Make Something Incredible!
getInTouch.title2: Ready to Make Some Magic Happen?

homeHero.description:
Where pixels meet possibilities, from 3D models to mind-blowing
animations and sleek UI/UX designs, we’re here to bring your
ideas to life. The dream begins here.

card1.text: The one who can turn any sketch into a 3D model that’s print-ready.
card1.title: The 3D Magician

card2.text: Fast, precise, and always ready to bring life to your ideas, frame by frame.
card2.title: The Animator Ninja

card3.text: They’ve got an eye for aesthetics and an obsession with functionality — perfect for UI/UX that’s both beautiful and intuitive.
card3.title: The Design Genius

card4.text: The mastermind behind those unforgettable videos that capture hearts and minds.
card4.title: The Storyteller

aboutDreamart.text: We’re a quirky team of 3D artists, animators, designers, and tech enthusiasts who believe that creativity has no limits.
aboutDreamart.title: About Dreamart

stat1.text: From prototypes to art, we’ve designed models for various industries.
stat1.title: 3D Models Created

stat2.text: From prototypes to art, we’ve designed models for various industries.
stat2.title: Successful Animations

stat3.text: Crafting intuitive, visually stunning designs for websites and apps.
stat3.title: UI/UX Designs

stat4.text: Creating high-impact videos that drive results and tell powerful stories.
stat4.title: Video Productions

stat5.text: Artists, creators, and businesses who trust us to bring their ideas to life.
stat5.title: Happy Clients

byTheNumbers.text: Here’s a Quick Glimpse of What We’ve Achieved
byTheNumbers.title: By the Numbers

hero.description: Welcome to Dreamart 3D — the place where ideas turn into tangible reality, imagination is our superpower, and creativity is our secret weapon. We don’t just create 3D models, animations, and designs — we craft experiences that make your brand unforgettable.

ourPhilosophy.tag: Less Talk, More Action (and Cool Designs)
ourPhilosophy.text: We believe in action. We’re not the type of agency that spends days writing reports about how great we are. Instead, we let our work speak for itself. Every project we take on is an opportunity to learn, innovate, and deliver something amazing. It’s not just about fulfilling a brief — it’s about making your brand shine in ways you didn’t even imagine.
ourPhilosophy.title: Our Philosophy

whatMakesUsDifferent.tag: We’re a Little Unconventional, and That’s Our Superpower”
whatMakesUsDifferent.text: We think differently. We push limits. We’re not afraid to get weird with it (in the best way possible). Our quirky approach to design and animation is what sets us apart from the sea of generic agencies. We see potential in every project and find fun in every challenge.
whatMakesUsDifferent.title: What Makes Us Different

whatWeDo.text: From 3D models for printing to stunning animations and next-level UI/UX designs, we make digital content that’s as bold as your ideas. Need a video that will make everyone stop scrolling? We’ve got you covered. Our work isn’t just about getting the job done — it’s about doing it in a way that wows.
whatWeDo.title: What We Do

whoWeAre.tag: A Team of Dreamers, Doers, and Digital Wizards
whoWeAre.text: We’re a quirky team of 3D artists, animators, designers, and tech enthusiasts who believe that creativity has no limits. We’re not just experts at what we do — we love doing it. Whether it’s bringing a concept to life with a 3D-printed model, designing an intuitive app, or animating characters that make people smile, we’re always pushing boundaries.
whoWeAre.title: Who We Are

text.0: Let’s face it, there are plenty of agencies out there. So why choose us? Simple: we bring a unique blend of creativity, precision, and a little bit of fun. We don’t just follow trends — we set them. We’re obsessed with the details, but we also know when to step back and let the big picture take the stage.
text.1: We take pride in our work, and we’re excited to work with clients who share our passion for creativity and innovation. Whether you’re an artist, creator, or brand ready to stand out, we’re the team to bring your vision to life.

letsCreate.description: Starting a new project or looking to elevate an existing one, we’re here to help. Let’s turn your vision into a masterpiece.
letsCreate.title: Let’s Create Something Epic Together

loginForm.description: Ready to jump back into the world of 3D magic? Just pop in your username, email, and password to get started! Forgot your password? No worries, just hit “Forgot Password?” and we’ll help you out!
loginForm.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
loginForm.title: Welcome Back, Creator!

ourSolutions.card1Label:
From Concept to Reality:
If you can dream it, we can model it. Literally.
ourSolutions.card1Text: Our 3D models are more than just designs — they’re high-quality creations ready to be printed in the real world. Whether it’s for prototyping, art, or retail, we build models that are ready for action.
ourSolutions.card2Label:
Lights, Camera, Action...
We Bring the Drama!
ourSolutions.card2Text: Need a captivating animation? Whether it’s for marketing, entertainment, or education, we deliver animations that keep people on the edge of their seats. Grab attention, tell stories, and leave an impression with every frame.
ourSolutions.card3Text: From explainer videos to promotional content, we create videos that tell your story in a way that sticks. You think it, we shoot it — bringing your vision into motion with precision and flair.
ourSolutions.card4Label:
Your Website Deserves to
Look Like a Million Bucks
ourSolutions.card4Text: We don’t just design websites; we design experiences. Our UI/UX design process ensures that your users will love navigating your site as much as they love the results. Beautiful, intuitive, and functional, all in one.
ourSolutions.description: No challenge is too big, no model too complex. Whether you need 3D printing models, epic animations, or intuitive UI/UX design, we’ve got the superpowers to turn your dreams into digital reality. We create solutions that aren’t just functional — they’re works of art.
ourSolutions.label: We Solve Problems Like Superheroes (Just With Better Gadgets)
ourSolutions.title: Our Solutions

priceList.description: We know you want all the details, and we’re happy to provide! Download our full price list to see all our packages, services, and prices in one easy-to-read PDF. Whether you’re just browsing or ready to get started, it’s the perfect way to find the package that works best for you.
priceList.label: Download Our Complete Price List
priceList.title: Get the Full Picture

pricesHero.description:
At Dreamart 3D, we offer flexible packages designed to fit your
needs and budget. Whether you’re looking for animation, UI/UX
design, or video production, we’ve got something for you. Here’s
everything you get with each package!

pricingPackage.description: We believe in fair, transparent pricing for all our services. From emerging artists to established creators, we offer flexible packages designed to suit your vision and budget. Get the high-quality, personalized service you deserve, without hidden costs. Let’s bring your creative ideas to life at a price that works for you.
pricingPackage.title: Pricing & Packages

privacyPolicy.contactDescription: For any questions, contact us at:

quoteRequestForm.dontWorry: Don’t Worry, We’ll Keep It Private
quoteRequestForm.doYouHaveAReferenceOrMoodBoard: Do You Have a Reference or Mood Board?
quoteRequestForm.wouldCall: Would You Like a Free Consultation Call?

readyToStart.description: At Dreamart 3D, we turn creative concepts into reality with solutions that drive impact. Looking to captivate your audience with stunning visuals or improve user experiences, we’re here to make it happen. Let’s take your project to the next level.
readyToStart.title: Ready to Start?

registrationForm.description: Ready to unlock the full potential of your creativity? Sign up today and get exclusive updates, fresh new features, and sweet deals that’ll take your design projects to the next level. Let’s make some 3D magic happen!
registrationForm.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

3DModelling.description: Our 3D models aren’t just cool — they’re print-ready, detailed, and ready to be awesome. From prototypes to figurines, we bring your wildest ideas to life with precision and style. Whether you need a super sleek vase or a custom action figure, we’ve got the modelling skills to make it happen.
3DModelling.exploreDescription: Dive into our collection of 3D models, where creativity meets precision. Whether you’re looking for stunning decor, custom figurines, or prototype designs, our models are perfect for your next project. Browse through a variety of categories and find the perfect design, ready to print and make your vision come to life.
3DModelling.exploreTag: Ready to Print, Ready to Wow!
3DModelling.hotDealsDescription: Time’s ticking! Grab our limited-time deals on 3D models before they’re gone. From quirky figurines to sleek prototypes, these models are ready to bring your ideas to life — and they’re at prices you won’t believe. Don’t wait — make them yours while you still can!
3DModelling.readyToText: Let’s create a custom masterpiece just for you!
3DModelling.title: 3D Modelling

animationCreation.description: Animation isn’t just about moving pictures — it’s about making magic happen on screen. From explainer videos that make complex ideas simple to epic animated commercials that will make your audience go, “Wow!”, we’ve got the skills to make your story come to life. Grab some popcorn, because your ideas are about to hit the big screen!
animationCreation.title: Animation Creation

design.description: We don’t just design websites and apps — we set up experiences that keep users coming back. We create sleek, intuitive, and fun designs that make navigation feel like a breeze. We blend beauty and functionality so your users have a seamless adventure.

0.desc: We start by diving deep into your brand and understanding your audience. It’s not just about designing for today — it’s about predicting what users need and how they think. We get to know your goals, your users, and the big picture before we even start sketching.
0.title: Discovery & Research

1.desc: Time to make the first move! We map out wireframes and create interactive prototypes to show you the layout and flow. Think of it as the skeleton of your future digital masterpiece — no clothes yet, but it’s already looking pretty good!
1.title: Wireframing & Prototyping

2.desc: Now, we add the fun stuff — colors, typography, icons, and all the visual elements that make your design pop! This is where we take the wireframe and turn it into something beautiful. It’s all about balance — functionality meets aesthetics to create a design that’s as smooth as it is stylish.
2.title: Visual Design

3.desc: Time to put our design to the test! We engage real users with the prototype, gather their feedback, and identify any friction points. The goal? To perfect the user journey and ensure a seamless experience for all users.
3.title: User Testing

4.desc: Once everything’s polished, we pass it on to the dev team, ensuring every pixel is in place and the design flows seamlessly into development. Our collaboration ensures that the final product not only looks great but also works flawlessly.
4.title: Development Handoff

5.desc: We believe that a design is never truly finished. After launch, we continue to monitor, gather user feedback, and iterate to improve. The digital world is ever-changing, and we stay ahead by constantly fine-tuning and enhancing our services.
5.title: Launch & Iteration

flow.desc: At Dreamart 3D, our UI/UX design flow is all about making your users’ journey smooth, intuitive, and downright delightful. From brainstorming to final clicks, we ensure every step is a piece of the puzzle, creating a cohesive and unforgettable experience. Here’s how we do it:
flow.tag: Creating Flawless Journeys from Start to Finish
flow.title: Our UI/UX Design Flow

design.tag: Designs So Smooth, Users Will Want to Hang Around
design.title: UI/UX Design

videoProduction.description: Let’s make your journey unforgettable. Whether it’s a commercial, a social media ad, or a heartfelt brand story, we create videos that get people talking. From script to screen, we bring creativity, fun, and flair into every frame. Ready for your close-up?
videoProduction.tag: Where Your Story Gets the Star Treatment
videoProduction.title: Video Production

description.0: We don’t just offer services — we create experiences. From 3D models that bring your designs to life to animations that steal the show, we’re all about turning your creative dreams into reality.
description.1: Need a stunning website, a jaw-dropping animation, or a game-changing 3D model? We’ve got the skills, creativity, and tech to make it happen. Let’s dive into the world of limitless possibilities together — your imagination is the only limit!

shop.description: Welcome to Dreamart 3D’s playground, where your wildest ideas go from “just a thought” to “look at that!” in a few clicks. From quirky home decor to iconic movie characters, our 3D models are designed to bring your creative visions to life without the complexity. Browse through our collection, pick your favorite, and let’s turn those brilliant ideas into tangible prints.
shop.label: Who knew 3D printing could be this fun?
shop.title:
3D Models That Make Your Ideas
Walk, Talk, and Print

specialOffers.button: Grab the Offer Before It Vanishes
specialOffers.label: Limited Time Magic! Don’t Let It Disappear!
specialOffers.text:
We’re offering exclusive deals to help bring your digital dreams to life.
Don’t wait around — these offers won’t last forever.
specialOffers.title: Special Offers

termsOfUse.contactDescription: For any questions, contact us at:

thanksPopup.description: Thank you for reaching out to Dreamart 3D. We’re thrilled to bring your vision to life and collaborate on something extraordinary. Our team will be in touch soon to start crafting the perfect solution for your project. Let
thanksPopup.title:
Your Creative
Journey Begins Here!

thankyouPage.description: Thank you for choosing Dreamart 3D — your creative journey starts now! Our team will be in touch soon to confirm the details and get things rolling. We can’t wait to bring your vision to life!
thankyouPage.title: Woohoo! Your Order is In!

trendsHero.description: At Dreamart 3D, we’re all about staying ahead of the curve. This is where we talk trends, share insights, and keep you updated on everything exciting in the world of 3D modelling, animation, UI/UX design, and video production. Explore the latest innovations and see how they’re shaping the future of digital creativity.
trendsHero.title: The Future of 3D Creativity

whatWeDo.description: At Dreamart 3D, we’re not just designers — we’re magicians. We craft everything from detailed 3D models to animations that make you say “WOW.” Need a digital experience that users won’t forget? We’ve got you covered with stunning UI/UX design. Think of us as the fairy godmothers of digital content, only way cooler.
whatWeDo.label: We Turn Your Ideas Into 3D Realities... (No, Seriously)
whatWeDo.title: What We Do

whyChoose.description: Our crew combines creativity, technology, and a touch of brilliance. We’re the team you call when you need more than just a 3D model or a pretty animation. You need a partner who can deliver stunning, high-quality content with a sprinkle of fun and creativity.
whyChoose.description1: We’re always ahead of the curve, bringing the latest techniques to our work.
whyChoose.description2: Your vision, our designs. Everything we do is tailored to your needs.
whyChoose.description3: Your vision, our designs. Everything we do is tailored to your needs.
whyChoose.description4: Your vision, our designs. Everything we do is tailored to your needs.
whyChoose.label: We’re Not Just a 3D Studio — We’re Your Creative Powerhouse
whyChoose.title:
Why Choose
Dreamart 3D?

wishlist.description: This is your creative playground — a place to save, organize, and revisit your favorite 3D models and animations anytime you want. It’s like your personal design museum, but cooler.

workHero.description: At Dreamart 3D, we don’t just complete projects — we transform concepts into immersive creations. From 3D models to captivating animations, our work is a blend of creativity, precision, and storytelling. Each project we take on is an opportunity to innovate, challenge norms, and exceed expectations.

work.label1: Turn ideas into prints that speak for themselves.
work.label2: Bring your story to life, frame by frame.
work.label3: Designs that flow, users that stay.
work.label4: Capture your vision, leave a lasting impression.
work.text1: Our 3D models aren’t just designs; they are high-quality creations ready for printing. Whether it’s for prototyping, art, or retail, we specialize in making your vision tangible.
work.text2: We craft animations that grab attention and tell compelling stories. From promotional content to full cinematic experiences, our animations engage and captivate audiences.
work.text3: We create seamless digital experiences that users love. Our UI/UX designs focus on both aesthetics and functionality to ensure a smooth, intuitive journey.
work.text4: We produce videos that make a memorable impact. Whether it’s an explainer, a commercial, or a cinematic project, our videos tell your story in a way that sticks.
